info.title: CFB v3 Scores
info.description: CFB schedules, scores, team stats, odds, weather, and news API.

get.description: Returns true if there is at least one game being played at the time of the request or false if there are none.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

get.description: Year of the current season. This value changes at the start of the new league year. For leagues that run over two years, this is the year the season starts, not ends.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

get.description: Number of the current week of the season. This value usually changes on Saturday into Sunday overnight, but in the rare case of a rescheduled or special game with a non-standard gameday this could change.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

get.description: A list of all conferences and their associated teams. Standings can be found here for each conference.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

get.description: Full team information: team name, school and city, conference and division, and colors. Also contains basic fantasy info such as IDs as well as full stadium data. This endpoint returns all teams regardless of current active status.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

get.description: Home and away teams, date and time, season type and week etc. are included. Also includes gameday information. This includes full stadium information (capacity, lat/long, surface etc.), top-line betting information (spread, moneyline, total), weather conditions, and broadcast information.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Year of the season (with optional season type).
Examples: 2018, 2018PRE, 2018POST, 2018STAR, 2019, etc.

get.description: Full scores and gameday info delivered live and post-game for a given date. Live data includes down and distance, as well as game clock. Gameday info includes referee, weather, TV channel etc.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the game(s).
Examples: 2016-SEP-01, 2017-SEP-10.

get.description: Full scores and gameday info delivered live and post-game for a given gameweek. Live data includes down and distance, as well as game clock. Gameday info includes referee, weather, TV channel etc.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Year of the season.
Examples: 2015, 2016, etc.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
The week of the game(s).
Examples: 1, 2, 3, etc.

get.description: Returns the box score statistical record team-wide (aggregated from all players) for a all teams' games in a given week, both live and post-game.
get.summary: Team Game Stats - by Week [Live & Final]

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Year of the season.
Examples: 2015, 2016, etc.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
The week of the game(s).
Examples: 1, 2, 3, etc.

get.description: Returns all season-long stats (i.e. the season total, not each individual game record) for all teams (aggregated from all players) for a given season. Also includes their standing information.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Year of the season (with optional season type).
Examples: 2017, 2017POST, 2018.

get.description: Returns all stadiums in the league with capacity, surface, latitude/longitude, city and state (and where applicable country.)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

get.description: The current type of season (e.g. REG, POST for regular or playoff.)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

get.description: The current season year, its start and end years, season type, week etc.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

get.description: Full player bio and details, including injury notes, for all active players.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

get.description: Player Details - by Player

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: playerid
parameters.description: Unique FantasyData Player ID. Example:50002016.

get.description: Full player bio and details, including injury notes, for all available players by team.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description:
The abbreviation of the requested team.
Examples: SF, NYY.

get.description: Game by game log of total team statistics.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Season to get games from. Example 2019POST, 2020

parameters.name: teamid
parameters.description: Unique ID of team. Example 1

parameters.name: numberofgames
parameters.description: How many games to return. Example all, 10, 25

get.description: This endpoint provides all currently injured college football players, along with injury details.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

get.description: The most basic top-line team information, such as team name and city, conference and division, stadium ID, coach info, and team colors. Returns all teams regardless of current active status.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

get.description: A lightweight schedule endpoint without gameday information. Home and away teams, the date and time of the game, and season type, week etc. are included. Ideal for the most basic information required to build a schedule.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Year of the season (with optional season type).
Examples: 2018, 2018PRE, 2018POST, 2018STAR, 2019, etc.

get.description: Roster information for a given team. Player profiles include basic biographical information, position, college, and current team (if attached to a team.) Specify a team tricode parameter to receive all players currently on that team.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description:
The abbreviation of the requested team.
Examples: SF, NYY.

get.description: This endpoint simply delivers quarter, clock, and total score live; no down and distance and no gameday info such as weather.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the game(s).
Examples: 2016-SEP-01, 2017-SEP-10.

get.description: Full player bio and details, including injury notes, for all active players.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

get.description: Full scores and gameday info, including weather, referee, infotainment odds, as well as all of the quarter scores and full-time score as the game ends.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the game(s).
Examples: 2016-SEP-01, 2017-SEP-10.

get.description: A slimmed-down score endpoint, giving just the quarter scores and final score, for simple applications, delivered as the game ends, called by date.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the games.
Examples: 2021-SEP-12, 2021-NOV-28.

get.description: A slimmed-down score endpoint, giving just the quarter scores and final score, for simple applications, delivered as the game ends, called by week.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Year of the season.
Examples: 2015, 2016, etc.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
The week of the game(s).
Examples: 1, 2, 3, etc.

get.description: Full scores and gameday info, including weather, referee, infotainment odds, as well as all of the quarter scores and full-time score, delivered as the game ends.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are xml or json.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Year of the season.
Examples: 2015, 2016, etc.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
The week of the game(s).
Examples: 1, 2, 3, etc.
